title: 08/15: Wide Receivers Preview (Part One) (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
We've discussed an elite Top 10 at RB, so how many elite WRs are there (2:30)? Are T.Y. Hilton and Mike Evans part of that group? We start at the top of the position and talk overall strategy (9:05) on today's show ... Do we change things up in 3-WR leagues (14:30)? Which of the elite WRs is most likely to be a bust (18:25)? We've also got sleepers (30:00), breakouts (35:00) and busts (40:00) at the position and this includes a lot of Stefon Diggs, Julian Edelman and Emmanuel Sanders talk ... Fun stats to consider for WRs and a look at the first 2-3 rounds of ADP (51:15). When is the right time to take Doug Baldwin? ... Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
